findings.message:
Contract locking ether found in 0xd7de455acaff66370f91d90dd0df8f07d3c84fe7.sol:
	Contract PenniHungary has payable functions:
	 - fallback (0xd7de455acaff66370f91d90dd0df8f07d3c84fe7.sol#128-141)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
findings.name: locked-ether
